events.description: The release of retail sales data for Hungary for December 2025, showing a 3.5% year-on-year increase.

facts.fact_text: Retail sales in Hungary grew by 3.5% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail sales in Hungary grew by 3.5% year-on-year in December 2025, accelerating from a 2.5% rise in the previous month.

facts.fact_text: Automotive fuel sales rose by 1.7% in December compared to 0.7% in November.

evidences.evidence_text: driven mainly by a faster rise in automotive fuel sales (1.7% vs 0.7% in November)

facts.fact_text: Full-year retail sales for 2025 increased by 2.9%.

evidences.evidence_text: For 2025 as a whole, retail sales went up by 2.9%, higher than the 2.6% rise recorded in 2024.

facts.fact_text: Seasonally adjusted monthly retail trade rose by 0.2% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: On a seasonally adjusted monthly basis, retail trade rose by 0.2%, following a 0.1% increase in December.

claims.claim_text: The acceleration in retail sales was primarily driven by automotive fuel sales.

evidences.evidence_text: This was the highest increase since April, driven mainly by a faster rise in automotive fuel sales

claims.claim_text: Growth in food and non-food sectors experienced a slowdown in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Meanwhile, growth slowed in food stores (2.1% vs. 2.6%) and non-food shops (4.3% vs. 4.6%)

evidence.evidence_text: driven mainly by a faster rise in automotive fuel sales
Retail sales in Hungary grew by 3.5% year-on-year in December 2025... For 2025 as a whole, retail sales went up by 2.9%
